feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud Key Management Service
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud Key Management Service

entry.title: Feature
entry.content: Cloud HSM for Google Workspace now lets you use Cloud HSM keys for client-side encryption (CSE) to protect sensitive workloads in Google Workspace. For more information about Cloud HSM for Google Workspace, including how to get started, see [Onboard to Cloud HSM for Google Workspace](https://cloud.google.com/kms/docs/onboard-hsm-workspace).
